National Taipei University of Technology: National Taipei University of Technology (NTUT, Taipei Tech; Chinese: 國立臺北科技大學; Pe̍h-ōe-jī: Kok-li̍p Tâi-pak Kho-ki Tāi-ha̍k) is a public university in Taipei, Taiwan. It is a member of the Global Research & Industry Alliance (Gloria) of the Ministry of Science and Technology[3] and accredited by AACSB.[4] Located in the Daan district of Taipei, the school was established in 1912 as the School of Industrial Instruction, one of the earliest intermediate-higher educational institute in Taiwan.
